oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clark St. MB Church: side
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Clark St. at 5th Ave., Huntingdon, TN 38344

Color photograph of church side. The brick church contains a gable-roofed vestibule that matches the gable roof of the main section. An addition, featuring a stepped parapet, intersects the original, main section. A side door provides entrance to this addition.

Clark Street Missionary Baptist Church is a congregation located in Huntingdon, Tennessee. The current building dates back to 1920; however, in 1981, the building was remodeled under the pastorate of Reverend Lonnie Grimes and with the aid of Golden Eagle Lodge #110, a local Masonic chapter.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee; Church buildings
